text: Stacy Martin (born 20 March 1990) is a French-English actress. She is best known for her role as the younger version of Charlotte Gainsbourg's character Joe in Nymphomaniac. Martin also appeared as J. Paul Getty's secretary in Ridley Scott's All the Money in the World. Martin was born in Paris. She lives in London with her partner Daniel Blumberg. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:French movie actors Category:English movie actors Category:Actors from Paris Category:Actors from London
title: Stacy Martin
